title: Sick of being banned over weak minded people getting upset. Done playing this game forever
body:
Game 1
In-Game
SoundTempest: sup
SoundTempest: it literally translates to eat butthole
SoundTempest: no
SoundTempest: is a hotdog a sandwich?
SoundTempest: i wanna suck a dick because i have a fetish where the idea of ejaculation makes me harder but id never fuck a dude
SoundTempest: ur fault
SoundTempest: gj liux
SoundTempest: tbh we shoulda seen that coming lux shaco always ganks lvl 2
SoundTempest: do we have a jungler?
SoundTempest: hey udyr
SoundTempest: you will lose this game because you neglect bbotlane
SoundTempest: i promise
SoundTempest: gg thanks for the loss udyr
SoundTempest: im tellin you late game this is over bdecause now shaco is fed and jinx isnt far behind
SoundTempest: wanna bet>?
SoundTempest: kk
SoundTempest: gg
SoundTempest: fed
SoundTempest: told u
SoundTempest: the shrooms lol
SoundTempest: uve got good positioning with them
SoundTempest: ur fault
SoundTempest: told you wed lose
SoundTempest: noob with no macro game skill
SoundTempest: oh wow look what happens when twitch says we are gonna lose macro game because udyr sucks ass
SoundTempest: might jsut int now cause ur all toxic
SoundTempest: LUL
SoundTempest: after he refused to gank bot?
SoundTempest: why am i behimnd?
SoundTempest: three gankss from enemy jg
SoundTempest: and you wonder why m behind
SoundTempest: asshole LOL
SoundTempest: gank bbotlane next fgame udyr youll prolly win
SoundTempest: as you can see, please report him
SoundTempest: ty blame the jg
SoundTempest: i didnt
SoundTempest: he did
SoundTempest: read chat logs
SoundTempest: reported udyr
SoundTempest: and kat cause duo
SoundTempest: i wonder how i was abble to predicgt this would hapen
SoundTempest: literally called it at 15 mins LOL
SoundTempest: ^^^
SoundTempest: gg
Post-Game
SoundTempest: have fun with the bans folks

replies.body:
Except for the rule is dogshit. What if the rule was "black people aren't allowed to play". Your logic would fit perfectly with that rule since you know 

>Riot has a rule. You stick to it. Simple as that really.

Anything and everything should always be open to criticism.

> [{quoted}](name=NA Region xD,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-01-05T20:52:21.136+0000)
>
> Except for the rule is dogshit. What if the rule was "black people aren't allowed to play". Your logic would fit perfectly with that rule since you know 
> 
> Anything and everything should always be open to criticism.

Define criticism.
"You suck delete lol"
"I hope you stay in bronze"
"How are you not banned?"

You call these criticism?

"What if the rule was "black people aren't allowed to play""
Yeah if we live in the 50s or something. But we're in the year 2019 now. I'm pretty sure if a company makes a game with that rule they won't last a weak even if their game is perfectly balanced.

> [{quoted}](name=King Lego,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:00:33.273+0000)
>
> Define criticism.
> "You suck delete lol"
> "I hope you stay in bronze"
> "How are you not banned?"
> 
> You call these criticism?
> 
> "What if the rule was "black people aren't allowed to play""
> Yeah if we live in the 50s or something. But we're in the year 2019 now. I'm pretty sure if a company makes a game with that rule they won't last a weak even if their game is perfectly balanced.

This.

I get it. People suck at this game, how dare they ruin MY good time and cost me LP. I get it. But if all you do is tell them they suck with no feedback on how to get better, it's NOT criticism. 

I raged at people like that for a long time. I'll never see that account again. It's whatever.

Criticism - the expression of disapproval of someone or something based on perceived faults or mistakes.

>Define criticism.
"You suck delete lol"
"I hope you stay in bronze"
"How are you not banned?"

What the hell are you talking about? I'm talking about being able to criticize and disapprove of an authority's rule set, (In this case Riots) because blindly agreeing with everything just shows a lack of brain activity on your end.

>Yeah if we live in the 50s or something.

No it has nothing to do with what decade we live in. It has to do with you saying rules should be followed without question just because they are rules.

>But we're in the year 2019 now. I'm pretty sure if a company makes a game with that rule they won't last a weak even if their game is perfectly balanced.

week*... and you're right but this is completely irrelevant to my point.

> [{quoted}](name=NA Region xD,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=0004000000000002,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:09:03.413+0000)
>
> Criticism - the expression of disapproval of someone or something based on perceived faults or mistakes.
> "You suck delete lol"
> "I hope you stay in bronze"
> "How are you not banned?"
> 
> What the hell are you talking about? I'm talking about being able to criticize and disapprove of an authority's rule set, (In this case Riots) because blindly agreeing with everything just shows a lack of brain activity on your end.
> 
> No it has nothing to do with what decade we live in. It has to do with you saying rules should be followed without question just because they are rules.
> 
> week*... and you're right but this is completely irrelevant to my point.

By saying stuff like
"You suck"
"You're so bad"
"We lost because of you"???

Yeah no not really.

Sure I must be brain dead or something for going with it.
If you don't like their regulations, then make your own game where you allow stuff like "You're bronze go kys" on chat for all I care.

I'm just playing this game because I like playing {{champion:161}} {{champion:6}} and {{champion:37}} 

Chats means nothing to me unless I meet some interesting people.

> [{quoted}](name=NA Region xD,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=000400000000000200000000,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:26:46.377+0000)
>
> I will continue to play league until every single one of my accounts is permabanned, and then I switch over to the thousands of other games not ran by thin skinned liberals. I will never conform to this new generation of chat censorship and gender changing.

Do I look like your babysitter?
You're like 10k miles away from where I am. So what the hell is stopping you?
Be our next Tyler1 for all I care.

I never claimed anything was stopping me nor did I claim you were my babysitter. You're just spewing out random bullshit. I have a post 4 spots below this one on the main page where I say every racial slur in the book and run it down mid the entire game.

> [{quoted}](name=NA Region xD,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=00040000000000020000000000010000,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:39:09.478+0000)
>
> I never claimed anything was stopping me nor did I claim you were my babysitter. You're just spewing out random bullshit. I have a post 4 spots below this one on the main page where I say every racial slur in the book and run it down mid the entire game.

Here's the funny thing.
I AM THE RANDOM BULLSHIT!

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

> [{quoted}](name=NA Region xD,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=000400000000000200000000,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:26:46.377+0000)
>
> I will continue to play league until every single one of my accounts is permabanned, and then I switch over to the thousands of other games not ran by thin skinned liberals. I will never conform to this new generation of chat censorship and gender changing.

Again, totally understand where you're coming from, but it's their game brah. Don't like, don't play.

> [{quoted}](name=King Lego,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:00:33.273+0000)
>
> Define criticism.
> "You suck delete lol"
> "I hope you stay in bronze"
> "How are you not banned?"
> 
> You call these criticism?

**crit·i·cism
/ˈkridəˌsizəm/Submit
noun
1.
the expression of disapproval of someone or something based on perceived faults or mistakes.**

That is actually criticism

> [{quoted}](name=R107 Games,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=0004000000000001,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:06:44.586+0000)
>
> **crit·i·cism
> /ˈkridəˌsizəm/Submit
> noun
> 1.
> the expression of disapproval of someone or something based on perceived faults or mistakes.**
> 
> That is actually criticism

In a bashing and belittling way?
Sure.

I'd rather have Gordon Ramsay critic me anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=King Lego,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=00040000000000010000,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:11:39.149+0000)
>
> In a bashing and belittling way?
> Sure.
> 
> I'd rather have Gordon Ramsay critic me anyway.

It's funny you brought up Gordon Ramsay. Because if he'd talk the same way he does to his chefs in game, he'd be chat restricted or banned.

Take that as you will

> [{quoted}](name=R107 Games,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=000400000000000100000000,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:23:59.349+0000)
>
> It's funny you brought up Gordon Ramsay. Because if he'd talk the same way he does to his chefs in game, he'd be chat restricted or banned.
> 
> Take that as you will

Can you blame him if he loses his mind if he sees Fizz or Nami?
Who would serve raw fish to the customers?

Yeah league of legends and restaurants don't go together really. League is not life threatening while restaurants can if you aren't clean. I mean haven't you watched kitchen nightmares?
Not even nino can keep all these restaurants clean even if he had help.
From a literal standpoint though, he just stated that he is in disapproval stance and hasn't expressed what was at fault. So wouldn't that, by definition, not be qualified as criticism?

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=00040000000000010001,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:14:44.987+0000)
>
> From a literal standpoint though, he just stated that he is in disapproval stance and hasn't expressed what was at fault. So wouldn't that, by definition, not be qualified as criticism?

That's right. I fucked up

to be fair...
saying "we're in the year 2019 now" is a stupid statement. 
everyone had racist/sexist thoughts at some point.
ever got dumped by your bf/gf? most likely you were like "all gender are the same" even if that thought was just for a sec.

not trying to say stuff like "no black ppl allowed" has any point here.

> [{quoted}](name=Arammus,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=0004000000000003,timestamp=2019-01-06T06:26:00.915+0000)
>
> to be fair...
> saying "we're in the year 2019 now" is a stupid statement. 
> everyone had racist/sexist thoughts at some point.
> ever got dumped by your bf/gf? most likely you were like "all gender are the same" even if that thought was just for a sec.
> 
> not trying to say stuff like "no black ppl allowed" has any point here.

Buddy, let me tell you something about racism in my stone age country called Lebanon and why the 2019 fits alot to my perspective.

Most foreigners are mere workers and don't speak Arabic very well and are often thought automatically are servants and nothing else. Many don't have the concept that India or Africa or other countries are different. Worst part is they'd freak out if they see a black guy speak Arabic very well.
Do I have the same mindset? No. Why? Because I lived most of my life outside the country and currently only there for university.

Hence why the "2019" part makes sense (To me). The world is fighting against racism while we can't even organize a government and our ancestors were stupid enough to call for independence 75 years ago.
This guy gets it. Just because there is a rule doesn't mean its a good one. League will never fix its massive toxicity issue if it doesn't change the rules
So what rule would change the toxicity issue?
Apply that logic to the politics/agencies of the world then please

> [{quoted}](name=SoundTempest,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:09:26.884+0000)
>
> Apply that logic to the politics/agencies of the world then please

Sure hold on a sec.

Hey Meddler, can you run for president of USA?

Meddler- sure. I'll talk about gameplay and such with more views now!

I come from a freaken stone age country for crying out loud.
Don't go "politic/agencies" on me while we don't even know what the hell it means.
xD
Sounds like you got upset cause you were neglected. Does that make you weak minded?

What you cannot see is his flaming (trash botlane, gg's... etc)  over the three ganks from the enemy jungler before i typed anything pre 10 minutes. Im not gonna just not say anything because the idea of just muting all is not conducive to changing anything. League needs to not perma ban anyone and that is the reason they have such a toxic community. Free speech is a thing for a reason because it allows people to settle their differences.

So... What does his flaming have to do with you being upset?  You are implying thatbonly weak-minded people get upset. Granted upset can cover a variety of emotions, it does seem you had gotten upset in the game.

If it needs to not ban anyone, then you don't get to be upset at trolls, griefers, afks, scripters, or any other gameplay toxicity.

Free speech isn't what allows for people to settle their differences. Free speech only prevents government from overly restricting speech (certian restriction are needed; such as shouting "fire" in a crowded theater only to cause panic). Businesses are not obligated by the same thing. If people are being particularly verbal, I will throw them out of the establishment I work at.
I am implying only weak minded people use the report button.
Damn, everyone must be weak-minded then. Unless of course you choose to not report gameplay toxicity, such as cheating/scripting/trolling.

> [{quoted}](name=SoundTempest,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:05:54.503+0000)
>
> I am implying only weak minded people use the report button.

I report people just to save myself time in the future having to type /mute all. XD and still type /mute all every game.

> [{quoted}](name=SoundTempest,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-01-05T20:26:35.339+0000)

> League needs to not perma ban anyone and that is the reason they have such a toxic community. 

Kind of disagree on that one. Permabans need to be there for inters/trolls/afkers/cheaters because they objectively ruin the game.

We have a toxic community because of the nature of a competitive online game.

Sure, as with most online games legitimate griefing people should be monitor-able automatically and bannable without the use of a button submittable by player reports. I guess i grew up on XBOX where if someone was a troll over voice chat you could easily just dismiss it, but here on league people feel some sort of sick vindication from the report button which makes them more prone to feeling like they have "won" Xbox live is not something anyone other than genuinely weak minded people look back on and say "damn that sucked" because it truly didn't and it created an environment where people could move on quicker from social interactions they did not like.
How do you propose an automated system determine the difference between someone playing bad and someone "acting bad" or trolling?

> [{quoted}](name=SoundTempest,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-01-05T20:26:35.339+0000)
>
>... Im not gonna just not say anything because the idea of just muting all is not conducive to changing anything...

Well, it certainly changed something. It changed the status of your account.

I wonder, did the jungler improve at all? Did he gank more?

Do you think he'll consider ganking more in future games? Why or why not?

Do we have any evidence of any results (positive or negative) besides the banning of your account?

If not, I suggest speaking up and trying to change someone in game is both an effort in futility, and harmful to your account status.

The only thing we can change, the only thing we really have any control over, is ourselves.

{{sticker:sona-playing}}

> [{quoted}](name=SoundTempest,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-05T20:15:37.768+0000)
>
> SoundTempest: have fun with the bans folks

https://imgur.com/gallery/w3hUyFC
I lol'd when it happened at first
I got five lines in. You may not mean to, but you sound pretty immature here. It may be funny among your friends,  but no one else is laughing.

Looks like you were banned on 12/11/18, judging from your match history. 

The question isn't "is this permabannable?" 

You were warned after your 2-week ban that the permanent ban would be the next step, so any punishment without sufficient reform would earn a permanent ban.

You persistently insulted your jungler and called for reports on him. Normally this would be a chat restriction, but your history made it a permanent ban.

If I'm wrong about your 2-week ban date, feel free to write a support ticket regarding your permaban. Otherwise, I think this will stand.

Well, good thing we don't tolerate people who are too weak minded to follow a simple set of rules. 
Besides, you being permabanned only means we want you gone. You were never meant to be playing in the first place.
Can't help but enjoy the irony.. I'm banned because people are weak minded.... as he rages at random people in a computer game.
You're banned for what you say. So... yor title is actually accurate.
...I stopped reading after about 4 or 5 lines because I wanted to puke.
You know you have a problem when letters in a certain sequence have a physical reaction on your body... just sayin!

> [{quoted}](name=SoundTempest,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-01-05T21:08:45.720+0000)
>
> You know you have a problem when letters in a certain sequence have a physical reaction on your body... just sayin!

Kind like you with the letters "Y-O-U -J-U-S-T G-O-T B-A-N-N-E-D"

> [{quoted}](name=SoundTempest,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-05T20:15:37.768+0000)
>
> Game 1
> In-Game

> SoundTempest: it literally translates to eat butthole

> SoundTempest: i wanna suck a dick because i have a fetish where the idea of ejaculation makes me harder but id never fuck a dude

First off, that's gay.



> [{quoted}](name=SoundTempest,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Tl5kYbE6,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-05T20:15:37.768+0000)
>

> SoundTempest: ur fault
> SoundTempest: gj liux
> SoundTempest: tbh we shoulda seen that coming lux shaco always ganks lvl 2
> SoundTempest: do we have a jungler?
> SoundTempest: hey udyr
> SoundTempest: you will lose this game because you neglect bbotlane
> SoundTempest: i promise
> SoundTempest: gg thanks for the loss udyr

Second off, that's why you got banned. You blamed Udyr for your mistake because you got ganked and died. And continued to flame and harass him.

I dont know man, if we are going by the rules then yeah probably. You've probably had previous punishments and thats how it goes. You shouldnt give up on the idea that you maybe are being stubborn about how you deal with the situation you're in. I mean, LoL has standards in their chat use. Just learn what they are. It's self preservation dude. Dont take it as some moral life lesson. Theyre just a fucking corporation. A business operating under capitalism. They are doing whats best for their business. Its not "giving in" to just follow the rules. Its kind of smart and requires a strong mind to learn how to not get emotional over anonymous strangers and their ability to play a video game. Try to look at it from that perspective. 

Its just a game.... and you fucking love it... its league.. but youre getting banned because you just flat out refuse to follow the rules on some moral ground about social issues and how you should be allowed to speak however you want. And then you just cant stand how other people talk to you. Youre playing yourself man. Youre allowing all of this to ruin your enjoyment of the game.
It's rule based on people standard, that's why some region are less harsh on punishment than other. But overall the big majority does not tolerate toxicity.
